Package jdbc

Class Database

java.lang.Object
jdbc.Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
Handles all actions to the SQL Database such as creation, editing or removal of information.

    • testConnection

      public static java.lang.String[] testConnection()
      Test the connection to the database by checking if the Connection is valid.
      Returns:
      A String[] array with some info about the connection like URL and name. Null if not valid.

    • listarProgramas

      public static java.util.ArrayList<PROGRAMA> listarProgramas​(boolean ativos, java.lang.String filter)
      Get the list of programs
      Parameters:
      ativos - boolean indicating if to return only active programs
      filter - String filter saying if the program is short or long term
      Returns:
      A ArrayList of PROGRAMA

    • adicionarColaborador

      public static boolean adicionarColaborador​(COLABORADOR colaborador, SEGURO seguro, VOLUNTARIO voluntario, ASSALARIADO assalariado, java.util.ArrayList<CONTACTO> contactos, java.util.ArrayList<CONTACTOEMERGENCIA> contactos_emergencia)
      Add a colaborator to the Database
      Parameters:
      colaborador - COLABORATOR object
      seguro - SEGURO object
      voluntario - VOLUNTARIO object
      assalariado - ASSALARIADO object
      contactos - ArrayList of CONTACTO
      contactos_emergencia - ArrayList of CONTACTOEMERGENCIA
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if it was successful

    • padRight

      private static java.lang.String padRight​(java.lang.String s, int n)
      Pad right function. Fills in the right side of a string with spaces.
      Parameters:
      s - The String to pad
      n - A int with the max length of the string with the pads
      Returns:
      The padded String

    • apresentarContactos

      public static void apresentarContactos​(java.lang.String tipo, java.lang.String tempo, java.lang.String filter)
      Get and print all contacts from the CONTACTO and CONTACTOEMERGENCIA tables.
      Parameters:
      tipo - String with the type of contact (normal or emergency)
      tempo - String time filter (last 6 months or 1 year)
      filter - String contact filter to show (email, phone or both)

    • apresentarColaboradores

      public static void apresentarColaboradores​(java.lang.String tipoColaborador)
      Get and print all colaborators from the COLABORADOR, ASSALARIADO and VOLUNTARIO tables.
      Parameters:
      tipoColaborador - String Type of colaborator to show. Either "Assalariado" or "VoluntÃ¡rio".
